mapper.insert: Insert into members (USERID, USERPWD, USERNAME, GENDER, HOBBY, BIRTH, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS, INTRODUCE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{hobby}, #{birth}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address} ,#{introduce})
mapper.select: select userId, userPwd, userName, gender, hobby, birth, age, address, phone, introduce from members where ( userId = #{userId} and userPwd = #{userPwd} )
